text.0: whoso remembers pūṣan as cater of mingled curd and meal.
text.1: need think no more upon the god.
text.2: and he is best of charioteers indra the heros lord allied.
text.3: with him as friend destroys the foes.
text.4: and there the best of charioteers hath guided through the speckled cloud.
text.5: the golden wheel of sūras car.
text.6: whateer we speak this day to thee wise wondrous god whom many praise.
text.7: give thou fulfilment of our thought.
text.8: lead on this company of ours that longs for kine to win the spoil.
text.10: prosperity we crave from thee afar from sin and near to wealth.
text.11: tending to perfect happiness both for to morrow and today.
